name: daily life in the apocalypse
description:
apocalypse (/əˈpɒkəlɪps/)
noun.
an event involving destruction or damage on a catastrophic scale.

a short interactive story about getting some food in an apocalyptic town.

(minor nsfw language warning)

(note: this game deals with some pretty heavy stuff, including mentions of suicide and death. avoid this game if either might trigger you.)
